name: Butter Pecan Biscuit
description:
I’d heard so much chatter about Capellas new Silver Line the last few days. 
Here’s my first entry using the new flavors. 
Biscuit gives that delightful cookie flavor. I’d say it’s a cross between a shortbread and a digestive biscuit. Has a light coconut taste to it. 
Butter Pecan I can only say wow. I’m not a nut flavor vaper, but this changed my mind. It’s sweet and buttery and decadent 
Cinnamon Sugar It reminds me of that premix blend you can get from your local supermarket. A lovely blend not too sweet and not too much cinnamon bite. 
I’ve been pleased thus far by the first flavors released in this line. 
Can’t wait to see what’s next!
author: SheilaG

reviews.text: Light on flavor after a steep, but really gets close to that Pecan Sandy profile
